in between worlds

  • about

Martin Trapp is a PhD student working on machine learning methods for cognitive science, natural language processing and computer vision. I'm working at the Austrian Research Institute for Artificial Intelligence in Vienna, Austria.

research interests

I'm specially interested in the following research fields:

  • Machine Learning, in particular Sum-Product Networks and Bayesian nonparametrics
  • Computer Vision
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Cognitive Science
  • Biomedical Image Processing
  • Neuroscience
